page.title: 09TALKING TO AN ELDERLY PERSON
page.content: { {Mrs.R.D.S.London}was born in Littleton and has lived the same house, Broadview,for 65 years.We interviewed her and found out about Littleton and she told us that Flowerdown,the new home of the Royal Green Jackets was going to be an H.M.prison or a housing estate if it was not defence land. The people of Littleton are very friendly.She approves of the changes such as electricity.Over the years it has been enlarged so there are more people and more houses.The only church is a Church of England church called { {St.Catherine's.}There are two army barracks,{Worthy Down Camp}and{ {Flowerdown. { }
